description: A study of Norwegian literature from 1890 to the present, this chronological overview places contemporary Norwegian literature in the context of historical, cultural, and linguistic change and relates Norwegian literature to international trends. Lectures, essays, and class discussion are in Norwegian. Prerequisite: Norwegian 253 or equivalent. Offered Spring Semester only.
name: Norsk Lit Etter 1890
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Norwegian 253 or equivalent. Offered Spring Semester only.
title: Norwegian Literature from 1890 to the Present
